name: material-agent-role
title: Material Agent Role
description: A role filled by a dcterms:Agent with respect to a dwc:MaterialEntity.

fields.name: agentID
fields.title: Agent ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: materialEntityID
fields.title: Material Entity ID
fields.comments: Values of dwc:materialEntityID are intended to uniquely and persistently identify a particular dwc:MaterialEntity within some context. Examples of context include a particular sample collection, an organization, or the worldwide scale. Recommended best practice is to use a persistent, globally unique identifier. The identifier is bound to a physical object (a dwc:MaterialEntity) as opposed to a particular digital record (representation) of that physical object.
fields.rdfs:comment: An identifier for a particular instance of a dwc:MaterialEntity.

fields.name: agentRole
fields.title: Agent Role
fields.description: A category that best matches the nature of a role of a dcterms:Agent.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary for the roles appropriate to the class of resource a dcterms:AgentRole is related to.

fields.name: agentRoleIRI
fields.title: Agent Role IRI
fields.description: An IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for a role of a dcterms:Agent.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: agentRoleSource
fields.title: Agent Role Source
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in dwc:agentRole is given.
fields.rdfs:comment: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

fields.name: agentRoleOrder
fields.title: Agent Role Order
fields.description: A numerical position of a dcterms:AgentRole in a set of dcterms:AgentRoles that have the same combination of dwc:agentRole, dwc:agentRoleIRI, dwc:agentRoleSource and related target.
fields.comments: One could use dwc:agentRoleOrder to create an ordered list of collectors (dwc:agentRole = 'collector') for a dwc:MaterialEntity, for example. The first would have dwc:agentRoleOrder=1, the second would have dwc:agentRoleOrder=2.

fields.name: agentRoleDate
fields.title: Agent Role Date
fields.description: An interval during which a dcterms:AgentRole was in effect.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a date that conforms to ISO 8601-1:2019.
fields.rdfs:comment: The date-time on which the relationship between the two resources was established.
